datafield.subfield: edited by Uwe Engel, Ben Jann, Peter Lynn, Annette Scherpenzeel, and Patrick Sturgis.

De Leeuw and Joop J. Hox -- Response effects and cognitive involvement in answering survey questions / Uwe Engel and Britta Köster -- Telephone surveys using mobile phones / Britta Busse and Marek Fuchs -- Interviewers and survey error : overview and introduction / Patrick Sturgis -- Can interviewer personality, attitudes and experience explain the design effect in face-to-face surveys? / Malgorzata Turner ... [et al.] -- Interviewers' falsifications in face-to-face surveys : impact, reasons, detection and prevention / Natalja Menold ... [et al.] -- Asking sensitive questions : overview and introduction / Ben Jann -- A new randomizing device for the RRT using Benford's law : an application in an online survey / Andreas Diekmann and Marc Höglinger -- Asking sensitive questions : a critical account of the randomized response technique and related methods / Ivar Krumpal ... [et al.] -- The factorial survey as a method for measuring sensitive issues / Katrin Auspurg ... [et al.] -- Conducting web surveys : overview and introduction / Lars Kaczmirek -- Web surveys in official statistics / Jelke Bethlehem -- E-social science perspective on survey process : towards an integrated web questionnaire development platform / Vasja Vehovar, Andraž Petrovčič and Ana Slavec -- Evaluating cross-national item equivalence with probing questions in web surveys / Michael Braun ... [et al.] -- Conducting access panels : overview and introduction / Uwe Engel and Annette Scherpenzeel -- Response behavior in an adaptive survey design for the setting-up stage of a probability-based access panel in Germany / Uwe Engel -- Survey participation in a probability-based internet panel in the Netherlands / Annette Scherpenzeel -- The access panel of German official statistics as a selection frame / Ulrich Rendtel and Boyko Amarov -- Accuracy of estimates in access panel based surveys / Tobias Enderle and Ralf Münnich -- Combining surveys with non-questionnaire data : overview and introduction / Rainer Schnell -- Linking surveys and administrative data / Rainer Schnell -- Enhancing surveys with objective measurement and observe ratings / Rainer Schnell -- The use of paradata / Frauke Kreuter -- Coping with nonresponse : overview and introduction / Peter Lynn -- Targeted response inducement strategies on longitudinal surveys / Peter Lynn -- Incentive Effects / Anja S. Göritz -- Nonresponse in comparative studies : enhancing response rates and detecting and minimizing nonresponse bias / Ineke Stoop -- Handling missing data : overview and introduction / Martin Spiess -- A split questionnaire survey design for data with block structure correlation matrix / Sara Bahrami ...
